lead_paragraph: Rutgers’s Greg Schiano was selected as one of the three finalists for the Maxwell Football Club’s George Munger Coach of the Year award, and the sophomore tailback Ray Rice was one of the three finalists for the 70th annual Maxwell award as the nation’s college player of the year. Schiano was joined in the final three by Jim Tressel of No. 1 Ohio State and Charlie Weis of No. 6 Notre Dame. The other Maxwell finalists are Ohio State quarterback Troy Smith and Notre Dame quarterback Brady Quinn.
